creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: large bowl-like or clam-like shape; grey, rust and metallic black color with crackled frosting-like white glaze on exterior; natural wood box with lid, marigold color cloth wrap, cream-colored mottled paper cover, and dark plum color tie
inscription:
lid verso: 志野　海神 {Shino Watatsumi}; signed: 秀樹 and red seal 
on paper label adhered to underside of box lid, black ink: Sino Watatumi / Hideki
markings: red ink seal on top of box lid, on label inside box lid; and on cloth wrap; seashell stamp on label inside lid and on cloth wrap
medium: Stoneware with white and black Shino glaze
title: Shino's Sea God
